text: A yi a fala e birin xa, a naxa, “Xa muxu yo waxi bira feni n tan fɔxɔ ra, fɔ a xa a mɛ a yɛtɛ ra, a yi a faxa wudin9.23 Romi kaane yi muxune gbangbanma wudin nan ma, e yi e faxa. Ito bunna nɛɛn, fa fala fɔ Yesu a xarandiine xa e wɛkilɛ sayaan na Yesu fɔxɔ ra. tongo lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ, a bira n fɔxɔ ra.
